bow: is the second child always difficult if the first child was good pregnant with my second and my daughter is the best baby anyone could ask for she entertains herself goes to sleep on her own hardly ever fussy and is even that fussy when teething everyone is telling me since she is this good this second baby is going to be terrible do want to believe them but honestly it is starting to stress me out anyone have second child that was just as good as the first my daughter was needy pain in he bum who only accepted me and never slept my son has colic allergies and if he not screaming because he uncomfortable he screaming because he has voice it crap shoot my friend has two angel children the first one was the chillest baby ever and is very well behaved little boy now the second is slightly less chill but very smiley and interactive both pretty good sleepers too though the second needed little sleep training starting at months removed idk but my first is tough one so number due in dec better be more chill your first child disposition will have no effect on the second the only real influence is what you ve been primed to expect since your first was really easy an average baby might seem like difficult one to you had the opposite situation where my first was difficult so the second seemed easy by comparison regardless all babies get older and grow out of these ages and stages at least you have some parenting experience now to help handle whatever comes 100 trying to not have expectations because figured this would be the case know that the new baby will have their own personality and that if expect them to be like my daughter ll be disappointed no matter what simply because they are going to be the same just hoped some people had experience with having two that were terrible since ve only heard stories of good baby and bad baby ve been told the same thing my first was the easiest baby ever and pregnant with my second and nervous just like you wonder if it just hard having two kids instead of one guess we will both find out soon good luck ve been suuuuuper lucky my first was is real chill and really sweet and so far my 10 month old has been really chill gt had the opposite situation where my first was difficult so the second seemed easy by comparison had this too now that they re both out of babyhood pretty sure both were more difficult than the average baby but eh this is pretty insightful comment think the second one tends to usually seem harder because you arent only focusing on the tiny baby needing everything you also have an older kid that has needs and wants and you have guilt about am giving them enough attention but thats just imho thought my first was cake walk but my second is the most laid back easy baby ever unless she hangry both slept through the night at weeks and have sunny dispositions was warned th the entire time was pregnant that my second would be nightmare but that was so far from the truth both of mine spin like tops suspected adhd great little boys but both are hard to manage energy wise 3rd on the way and we hope for calmer child probably wo happen though like someone said earlier it crap shoot yes we ve had two pretty easy baby boys in our family had the same worry during my second pregnancy but they re pretty chill and great sleepers my first was super easy and my second is also super easy if the second one is harder it because now you have two of course it harder to care for your baby when you have toddler to take care of at the same time agree wholeheartedly with this sentiment my have to pick one over the other sometimes the baby is crying because they need to be fed and the toddler is crying because the cat wouldn let him pet her there lot less down time when there second child so the second child seems more difficult than the first but that just my experience every child and situation is different people are just making conversation but my first was amazing and sweet and calm and my second was colicky and now wild child but that doesn mean yours will be removed both my kids are bad lol just joking of course but they both have their things for example my now almost nah we had two awesome chill kids everyone kept telling me that because our first was so chill the second one would be the devil incarnate say the second is even more chill here hoping the same for you my mom said that was super easy baby and my brother the youngest was difficult think it just luck of the draw was also off of naps early so it was always going to seem harder dealing with two kids only have one my daughter was super easy baby would call her difficult toddler but would call her easy either she fun ll give her that haha but she does always sleep well starting at about 16 months baby either way it wo last forever so ask for help when you can try to enjoy them and know that the bad moments pass congrats me both my sons were very calm babies slept well entertained themselves when their naps sync up it is amazing think it is all just exhausting even when youre lucky enough to get great sleepers nope my second was even and in fact is still even easier than she is was thought my first daughter was good baby until had my second and she was somehow even better yes both my babies were good babies different but both good first was daughter second son think had better is pretty laid back kid my first two boy and then girl were angels they slept through the night very early took naps ate whatever we gave them happy so smiley my 3rd baby is smiley no sleep bitey reserved loves school big time nerd lol my year old daredevil super outgoing and hates school so much my baby is still only months old but we will see think it safe to say to expect differences that way you re not shocked when they are two totally different kids lol after much research my assessment is yes yes my second is just as good as my first she did have constant ear infections but now it always feels harder with second one bc the whole nap when the baby naps etc doesn apply when the baby is sleeping or chilling the other child needs you and when the baby is screaming the other but challenging little people now think having higher needs baby second is the worst because you re lulled into this sense of false security the first time around we totally have friends with two defiant kid even as toddler he slept so good as baby remember used to wake him up to feed him in the middle of the night because was worried he would starve was new mom lol he was also identified as always wants held and will cry until she gets picked up she is already little diva lol had no expectations for either kid but the first was easy peasy still is and my second is challenging stubborn and has to do everything on her own time have heard the joke that the first child lulls you into false sense that you should have another my kids were the opposite our first was difficult and had many
